name: Custom Software Development
description: End-to-end development of robust, innovative, secure, and efficient B2B software solutions tailored to your exact needs. We handle everything from initial planning through deployment and ongoing support.
short_description: Custom B2B software built from scratch to match your specific requirements
key_features: Cross-functional teams (PM, developers, designers, QA engineers)
Multiple tech stacks (Java, .NET, Node.js, Python, React, Angular, Kubernetes)

name: Agentic AI Systems
description: Turn AI experiments into reliable, usable features and workflows with autonomous decision-making capabilities. We build production-ready AI agents that can make intelligent decisions and take actions on your behalf.
short_description: Build AI agents that can make autonomous decisions and take actions
ideal_for: Companies wanting to move AI from experiment to production

name: Product Discovery
description: Strategic workshops to validate your product idea, understand market needs, and define the right approach before investing in development.
short_description: Validate and plan your product strategy before building

name: AI Discovery Workshop
description: Structured workshops to identify AI opportunities in your business, assess feasibility, and create a roadmap for implementation.
short_description: Discover where AI can add value to your business
ideal_for: Businesses with manual processes to automate
Organizations seeking competitive advantage through AI

name: UX/UI Design
description: User-centered design services including user research, wireframing, prototyping, and visual design to create intuitive, engaging interfaces.
short_description: Design intuitive interfaces your users will love
ideal_for: Companies wanting to improve user satisfaction

name: Team Extension
description: Augment your existing development team with our experienced engineers who integrate seamlessly into your workflows and processes.
short_description: Extend your team with experienced developers

name: Minimum Viable Product (MVP)
description: Rapid development of a functional MVP to validate your product idea in the market quickly and cost-effectively.
short_description: Launch your product idea quickly with a lean MVP

name: Enterprise Application Modernization
description: Transform legacy systems into modern, scalable, cloud-native applications while preserving business logic and minimizing disruption.
short_description: Modernize legacy systems without disrupting your business

name: Camunda BPM Platform Integration
description: Expert integration of Camunda BPM platform to automate and optimize your business processes with workflow orchestration.
short_description: Automate workflows with Camunda BPM integration

name: Okta CIC Platform Integration
description: Secure identity and access management integration using Okta Customer Identity Cloud (CIC) platform.

name: IoT Location Solutions
description: Custom IoT solutions for real-time location tracking and monitoring, especially for safety-critical environments.
short_description: Real-time IoT tracking for safety-critical environments
